select distinct concat(concat(concat(concat(og.orgname,'-'),p.pname),'-'),p.mobil_phone) as opmname,p.pid,p.pname,p.mobil_phone,og.orgname from og_person p left join og_org og on p.orgid = og.orgid LEFT JOIN og_user u on p.pid=u.pid where p.pname is not null and u.invalidation_mark='1' and p.invalidation_mark='1' and OG.LEVEL_CODE LIKE '/000000000/010000888/%'

select distinct p.pid,p.pname,p.mobil_phone,og.orgname from OG_PERSON p,OG_USER u,OG_R_USER_POST up,OG_POST op,og_org og where p.PID = u.PID and u.USERID = UP.USERID and UP.POSTID = OP.POSTID and p.orgid = og.orgid and p.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' and u.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' and OP.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' and op.postid in ('0002','0010','0011')

select p.pid,p.pname,p.mobil_phone,og.orgname from og_person p left join og_org og on p.orgid = og.orgid where p.pname is not null and rownum = 1 and p.invalidation_mark = 1
and p.mobil_phone = #{mobilephone}

rownum = 1 and v.duty_date like concat('%',concat(#{dutyDate},'%')) and t.typeinfo_id = #{typeinfoId}
select version_id from duty_version where duty_date like concat('%',concat(#{dutyDate},'%')) and rownum = 1

select s.scheduling_id,t.type_name,t.typeinfo_id, to_char(to_date(s.duty_date,'YYYY-MM-dd'),'yyyy-fMMM-dd') as duty_date,s.pid,s.pname from duty_scheduling s left join duty_typeinfo t on t.typeinfo_id = s.typeinfo_id where s.pid like concat(concat('%',#{pid}),'%') and s.duty_date like concat(concat('%',#{dutyDate}),'%')
